website_summaries.verdict: Faux leather that really vamps up a tired chair.
pros: Good-looking, grips the chair and stays put
Looks as if it costs way more
cons: Need to be eased on to the chair, and despite some stretch, there’s not much wiggle room in the sizing

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A cover that fits
customer_reviews.text: My cats had destroyed our leather dining room chairs and I have never been able to find a chair cover that fit, in any style. Finally, I saw this item. At first I thought they were going to be too small as well but with some pulling and stretching, it fit. The material feels strange off the chair but once it’s on, you don’t notice a difference. My chairs look like they did the day we bought them. The only thing I noticed wrong was that the cover doesn’t “fold” where the seat and back meet, leaving a curved look. This is going away though after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: The M's

customer_reviews.title: Love these - they grip to the chair and don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these - they grip to the chair and don't come off like the cloth ones do !
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Goldmeier

customer_reviews.title: Totally works!
customer_reviews.text: We were wondering if we needed to buy new chairs since the leather was peeling and cracking but these totally covered them up nicely. Our chairs have a slightly longer bottom cushion, so it doesn't cover it entirely but you need to look closely and spend time studying instead of just sitting on it to notice.
customer_reviews.author: SKo

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover-Up for Boy Damage
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cover our diningroom chairs because our boys destroyed our upholstery. For those with boys, you get it. Why both buying new chairs when you can just cover up the damage? We put these on, no one sees the messed up cushions underneath, and they are easy to wipe after every meal. My only note is that they easily pop off the bottom while getting up and out of the chairs, which can reveal the damage of the actual chairs. Otherwise, great deal.
customer_reviews.author: DogMama

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for covering my parsons chairs. They are about 1/2" short at the bottom. But I love them anyway, plus they are really waterproof. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Micki B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution,  perfect price
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of deep red leather parsons chairs and stools that started to flake. They were rarely used, thus structurally in perfect shape, other that the flaking leather. These covers worked to a T. The color was close enough and they fit/look great. I still can't believe they worked that well for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect, they do not look cheap, they feel great under bottom.
customer_reviews.text: They fit on my chairs exactly as shown in photo. Love that they are washable. Just replaced fabric one with these and I hope they hold well, I might consider buying another set just to have.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Product Non-Durability
customer_reviews.text: Product failed to last two week of daily dining sittings without material separating at the seams. Buy at your own risks. They look good, were easy to slide on our bar-high dining chairs. Just disappointed how quickly one of them came apart.
customer_reviews.author: TeamMac

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love those covers! That are super easy to put on and they look great!!! Before I found them I was looking to buy new chairs, that have saved me hundreds of dollars!!! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: tuzcu lenka

customer_reviews.title: I like these!
customer_reviews.text: My chair is bigger and I was worried it wouldn't fit but it stretched good and didn't rip. They look really nice and great for the price of $34.95 for a set of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: They don’t look like the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought slip covers for my chairs in the past and always have been happy but not this time. As soon as O took one out of the bag, the awful chemical smell came out. They are very small and don’t fit as perfect as the fabric type. They just don’t look good. I will probably be returning them back.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't completely cover my chairs but good enough
customer_reviews.text: They don't completely cover my dining chairs but they cover enough of my ripped chairs. Received compliments from visitors. Better alternative then paying to get each chair re-upholstered being we are planning on purchasing a new dining.
customer_reviews.author: Tinytee1

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing. My chairs have curved tops and magically these ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. My chairs have curved tops and magically these things fit like a glove. Of the 8 I purchased, 1 did not have the seam finished at the bottom so the white elastic sticks out. Wish they had them in camel or cream colored!
customer_reviews.author: By kba

customer_reviews.title: Love the realistic faux leather snug fitting slipcovers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these inexpensive real looking slipcovers! Goes on easily and doesn’t move around! Don’t like that there is a slope where front back meets the seat. Otherwise it a great inexpensive way to renew a a tired slipper chair.
customer_reviews.author: M'Len

customer_reviews.title: Won't be able to notice they're covers
customer_reviews.text: They look like the real thing. You won't be able to notice they are covers, except if you pay very close attention to the bottom elastic part (which I expected). The reason I give it 4 stars is because it had excess fabric on the back part... you can kinda work with that. As for durability, I don't know yet. Just got 'em.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: like the easy of cleaning but dont fit all chairs measure before buying they stretch but not enough for some of my chairs
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette L McManus

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this product. Prior to purchasing these chair covers I contemplated purchasing new chairs. My chairs were raggedy, but now they’re renovated and look great. I’m surprised by the quality and the price. These chair covers saved me $$$$ and I love the popping color. I’m beyond satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it cost
customer_reviews.text: Happy with chair covers. Makes chairs look brand new at 1st look. Easy to install, not sure if easy to rip. However, I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: grmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: They look cute in pictures but the material looked like cheap plastic wrap on my chairs. I did not like this look. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Zaelke

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: These made my high top table chairs look brand new! Totally worth it. Does not look cheap and for very well.
customer_reviews.author: CSB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to buy new chairs for my dining table....found these and they work perfectly...for the price you can't beat it....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I've purchase
customer_reviews.text: There's no way I'm letting anyone spill anything on my chairs specially the kids. I've purchase this product the week of my birthday party and It came two days before. Let me tell you its the best purchase I made it looks leather very easy to clean after the party. Everyone was letting me know they like it and where I got it from. I let them know once again Amazon baby Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Oco

customer_reviews.title: The quality was good
customer_reviews.text: The quality was good. I gave 3 stars because the sizing is definitely off. They are much smaller than advertised. I would have returned, but i opted to take the 30% refund rather than paying to return. I don't know what I will do with them. Hopefully i'll find someone with chairs that they will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Color is uniform and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect...they fit well, maybe a little big on the backside as in long, but overall they look good and these cover the ugly wearing I had on my pleather chairs. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: cheller

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Order four chair covers and three of the four fit. I need to contact Amazon to figure out how to resolve this situation. Too bad because they are very nice. Fit is a little tight. Problem solved immediately with one simple phone call. Very pleased all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Alioto

customer_reviews.title: Not THAT stretchy
customer_reviews.text: They would look nice if they fit my chairs..not enough spandex... and one out of four has a defect..long stripe down the whole thing a lighter red then the rest of the cover...also the color doesn't match the web site picture...not the same kind of red
customer_reviews.author: Melodie

customer_reviews.title: matches original set well
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 faux leather counter height chairs and two of them ripped at the seats. I was able to install these covers quickly. I was worried that it wouldn't match the other 4 chairs that have not yet ripped. My husband and mother couldn't even tell when walking up to the table which seats I covered.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn H

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but didn't fit my chairs
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, but didn't fit my chairs, needs about two extra inches of fabric all around. I've gotten others that fit well several times before
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: looks and fits perfect on my old chairs
customer_reviews.text: looks and fits perfect on my old chairs, but they have few wrinkles, dono how to get rid of them
customer_reviews.author: kishore

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but the quality of the material and finishing is very very poor quality. I have returned all very next day.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: chair cover
customer_reviews.text: Really like this chair cover and the cost. Worth the little amount of money it costs!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Boehler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Garbageripped apart as soon as you put it on. Wish I could give it 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisianne Contorno

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it did before
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, needed a bigger size other than that looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: My chairs look new
customer_reviews.text: It looks like I bought new chairs. It was work to wrestle them on the chairs but they stay in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Harris

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I sure didn't want to throw out these perfectly good bar stools just because of junk upholstery. This product should give them a few more years of life. I hope they are more durable than the original ones.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Hall

customer_reviews.title: fix ok
customer_reviews.text: It is an efficient and perfect solution for when you can not upholster the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Cheo

customer_reviews.title: Fit great! Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this beautiful set for my dining room. The color is perfect for my decor. They fit good and are very durable. My son thought that I purchased new chairs. I plan to get more sets for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: I didnt receive what was pictured, but the situation was resolved quickly to my satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I didnt receive what was pictured, but the situation was resolved quickly to my satisfaction
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat damage the dinning chair but with this covers they looks like new and you can not tell is a cover, looks like the chair is like that!
customer_reviews.author: Anibal Baez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They make my old faux leather chairs look new again. Tight fit, but if you go slow they will stretch and don’t rip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit Chairs
customer_reviews.text: The covers did not fit the chairs and tore upon installation. Pure garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have had a few people ask were I got them. Very easy to clean, just bought some car leather seat wipes and it cleaned them right up. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CHET MEADOWS

customer_reviews.title: Good option to buying new chairs
customer_reviews.text: I got these for some counter chairs and they fit really well. If you have dep seats, it could be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bangerter

customer_reviews.title: Good cover; peels with frequent use.
customer_reviews.text: These covers lasted for two years and a few moves, however they started peeling after a few months of use. Definitely waterproof and better to clean with a wet rag than any chemicals (AKA Clorox wipes) as that makes it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! Such an affordable way to create a new look or just refreash the old. Great quality and sticks tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Great for a buck
customer_reviews.text: Fits smaller dining chairs even better I’m sure This was a hard fit on mine - The white cloth cushion still shows a bit but they do a L look great with the colors
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaTrenna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these covers on my dining chairs for a few months now and I must say it was worth the buy. So far no tear or any sign of damage. I’ll buy again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: rashna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to restore your chairs on a budget and look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: R.V.N.

customer_reviews.title: The fishy smell but it will go away
customer_reviews.text: I like about this product is that is exactly how is in the picture it's very easy to put on the only thing it had like a fishy smell but I guess it will go away overall the Product is very nice as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: I love them! They feel very smooth and soft
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They feel very smooth and soft. My chairs are a little odd shape but they worked. They long to get them.

customer_reviews.title: Get a better quality
customer_reviews.text: First it says light gray it came deep gray and it also says leather and it’s not it looks and feels like a tick plastic bag

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waste your money on these seat covers!! Look like trash bags. I won't get into the God awful smell. These were returned immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They fit so well. Make the chairs look like new. The only negative is they bunch up a bit near the opening of the seat.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy install!!  Forgot to take photos, sorry.  I will add tomorrow if possible.
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee this product. My chairs look literally brand new. All the other reviews written were obviously true that convinced me to make this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Leather like seat covers
customer_reviews.text: Nice covers, easy to put on the chair. Comfortable material

customer_reviews.text: I like the product because it was easy to install

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Water resistant but some difficulty with getting them on our chairs.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product...It looks perfect and fits perfect on my chairs...I love it...THANKS A LOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I love this product fits snug on chairs unlike the drape's ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product fits snug on chairs unlike the drape's over the chair look we had before. Our chair's are at least 10 years old but not a scatch on them they are built well and this product gives them a whole new look . Going to order a couple more tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Vancarlo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the material, and it’s very hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: The product itself was very nice and as described
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was very nice and as described. they did not fit the width and height of the chair seat. My chairs have a wide covering. I wish they had a product that would fit the bottom, would buy in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the original chair Easy to put on Great price

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these over 5 months ago and they have not cracked or ripped like my original seats ! Great quality !
customer_reviews.author: Makabok01

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit .
customer_reviews.text: The seat covers are good but they don’t fit the chair size as stated in the details. I had a hard time putting them on the chairs and they come off when my kids sat on it . The quality seems good but too tight for my chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mee Shar

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Before & After. Awesome Product! ;) Not a review person but had to with this. 4 of these were around $58.00 compared to $650.00 to replace 4 chairs. ;) So Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My chairs had gotten beat up and ripped from kids and moving but these covers made them look brand new again

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are a Perfect fit for my pub chairs! Completely satisfied with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit a bit small and for that reason some of the stitching was undone.

customer_reviews.title: they are just right ,they fit nice and feel nice
customer_reviews.text: Im very pleased with the covers, LL b orderin another set of them ,Thanku

customer_reviews.title: I am completely satisfied with the chair covers
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with the chair covers. I am actually going to be ordering them in another color.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for people with kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wipe clean. Stays on the chair quite well. preserves chairs. looks nice!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit and Color
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and fit snugly. The wine color is great to instead of Red.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: It has a beautiful color, so stretchy that can fit wide chairs
customer_reviews.text: It has a beautiful color, so stretchy that can fit wide chairs. It covered my chairs nicely and everyone asks me if I buy a new chairs. I love it

customer_reviews.title: These were easy to install and look great
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and look great! Saved me from having to replace my entire bar stools when the leather was cracking!!

customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I was looking for!! Great price and material !

customer_reviews.title: They look good,, they wrinkle a little
customer_reviews.text: They look good ,, they wrinkle a little ,,Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the custom fit that it has I love love them
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Smells like fish fit is less than ideal but it will do. For nearly $10 a chair cover I have to say I'm not very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive fix.
customer_reviews.text: These worked out perfectly. I was looking at getting all new chairs because my cats tore up the leather seating on my old one. These were fairly inexpensive (a lot less expensive than new chairs), so I decided to give them a try. They look really great and I can keep my chairs for a while. The only complaint I have is that the covers do not tuck in where the seat meets the back (behind your derriere). Other than that, they are great. When my family came for Christmas, they asked if I had gotten new chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Usually Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fix to my cat clawed chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was easy to clean as I haven't had them long enough, but it looks like it would be. I gave 4 stars as my chairs happened to match the largest size these covers could fit on chairs and it was really a little too snug. I'm sure they'll stretch out a bit, but it would be better if they had been given a little more fabric for the measurements they give as the max size of chair. Needless to say otherwise, it was remarkable how good they looked considering how simple the cover!
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for the chairs I wanted to cover. I have purchased subtex fabric covers before and they were easy to put on and performed as expected but due to our cats scratching on them and starting to look ragged, I was looking for newer covers that resembled leather. Disappointed in the quality and fit and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H Tvedten

customer_reviews.title: Sanity Savers!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set! These chair cover have kept my sanity after cats and kids have wrecked the upholstery on my dining room chairs. I noticed my last set was getting worn (by excessive abuse from kids and cats) and ordered another set. I get compliments and everyone wants to know where I got them. These chair covers have saved my sanity! Easy to put on and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Clarkin

customer_reviews.title: helped hide our ugly chairs
customer_reviews.text: We bough these because little ones ruined the leather on the chairs we first had so we needed a quick fix without having to purchase a whole new chair set for our kitchen table. These slipped on quickly and look great. If my kiddos drop anything on em I just wipe em clean and they're good to go. I think for the time being they look pretty decent. Obviously they're not perfect for my chair shape but I like them still.
customer_reviews.author: Blushed22

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed at how good of quality this was and also how easy it was to install. It definitely works better with a “full size” dining room type chair instead of a smaller/thinner style. I tried it on both and it just fits a little more snug on the bigger chair. The only con is that it doesn’t tick tightly in the back corner of the seat so I have to keep a pillow there or it’ll drive me crazy( a little OCD). All in all though it’s a great buy and much cheaper than replacing my chair.
customer_reviews.author: AshFerg 1

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing chair cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover compliments my chair and you can't even tell that it's a cover. It fits perfectly and the material is very good quality and stretches beautifully over my chair. I am happy to have found this and will order again if needed. I have had for months now and very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved these because they look very beautiful on my chair for such a reasonable price, the only regret was that the back of my chairs are curved inside slightly so they leave a hollow area at the back. I really wish it worked because otherwise it is a great buy! Recommend to others who have chairs with straight back.
customer_reviews.author: icing

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 leather chairs and the leather had been cracking really badly. We were really considering purchasing new chairs but the frames were in good condition. We also considered re-upholstering the chairs but it was too expensive. These chair cover fits perfectly and my kids didn't realize the difference. The only issue was they were there are slight creases but nothing to complain about. For the money that we saved and how the chair look, it is worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Antiguan Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like leather!
customer_reviews.text: I only bought one pack to make sure they fit my dining chairs as the faux leather started to peel and looked hideous! These fit perfectly and they look really nice. I need to buy another four so I could finish replacing the rest of my chairs. Thank you for such a wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.author: JuanaBme

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't find new ones that I liked so I decided to purchase these covers and try ...
customer_reviews.text: The paint on my kitchen chairs was coming off. I couldn't find new ones that I liked so I decided to purchase these covers and try them on my chairs. Love them. Look nice and wear well so far. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DebW

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I have a Husky and hair goes everywhere! I was so annoyed that I couldn’t sit on my dinning table without being covered. This was the perfect solution
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived very fast, not the best fit but I guess for the price they will do. Be careful when you put them as they are a bit snug and will rip. I purchased these for my leather kitchen chairs that my cats have destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! Completely changed the appearance of my dining room. So many compliments, no one believes they’re covers until I have the pull up the bottom. They’re tight and initially hard to get on, and once they’re on they need a few days to settle and then they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dylan s.

customer_reviews.title: Dining Chair Covers
customer_reviews.text: They fit my chair perfectly. I wish they were a tad lighter in color but the sure do the job in covering up my fabric chairs.
customer_reviews.author: J.Harris

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and $15 to return!
customer_reviews.text: Way too tight on my basic dining chairs. Looked like they were about to rip off. Very frustrating that I have to pay to return the item. At $15 shipping costs, it doesn’t seem worth it. Beware that it’s a risk to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. They made my chairs look brand new
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They made my chairs look brand new, and were easy to slip on. I used them over cloth upholstered chairs that the cats had used as scratching posts. The cats won't scratch these!
customer_reviews.author: James M McGill

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleased with these covers. Our stools were bonded leather the same color as the covers. They were flaking and cracking but now they look just like they did when they were new. It helps to have two people to put them on since stretching is required.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get them on the chairs, too tight I would have loved the look
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for Parson chairs! ❤️❤️❤️ On time delivery, reasonable price, and they look GREAT! :) 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair covers
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my chair covers. They fit perfectly, and the right color and price. I would recommend these covers to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Black  .
